title: Abhimanyu's Brave Stand in the Chakravyuh

chapters.title: Introduction to the Chakravyuh
chapters.description: Set the scene of the Mahabharata war and introduce the concept of the Chakravyuh formation.

chapters.title: Abhimanyu's Knowledge
chapters.description: Explain how Abhimanyu learned the way to enter the Chakravyuh but not exit it.

chapters.title: The Battle Begins
chapters.description: Describe Abhimanyu's courageous entry and fierce fight within the Chakravyuh.

chapters.title: The Hero's Sacrifice
chapters.description: Conclude with the overwhelming odds and Abhimanyu's ultimate sacrifice, emphasizing his bravery.
